title: Packaging tweak to MTCleanHTMLPlugin
summary: Quick update to MTCleanHTMLPlugin: renamed the directory extdir in the tarball to extlib, which is what it should have been for easy drop-in installation. Thanks to John of illuminent.com, whose weblog gets me funny looks at work. :)
content:
Quick update to MTCleanHTMLPlugin: renamed the directory extdir in the tarball to extlib, which is what it should have been for easy drop-in installation. Thanks to John of illuminent.com, whose weblog gets me funny looks at work. :) shortname=ooobig

        <div class="content">ok, so I spent a few minutes installing the module, but it doesn't work with my set up... don't know what it's conflicting with, but it won't even let me load my mt.cgi file when it's all installed where the readme says to install it...

    I'm thinking that perhaps the permissions are wrong, but they're the same as the other modules and plugins I'm installed...

    sort of perplexed at this point...

    any thing i can tell you that might help you help me?
